title.ja: 高度なマイクロブレーディング

description.en: Advanced techniques for creating natural, hair-like strokes
description.vi: Kỹ thuật nâng cao tạo nét lông mày tự nhiên như thật
description.ja: 自然な毛並みを作る高度なテクニック
description.es: Técnicas avanzadas para crear trazos naturales similares al cabello
description.ko: 자연스러운 모발 같은 선을 만드는 고급 기술

subtitle: Master Natural Brow Artistry
introduction: Take your microblading skills to the next level with advanced stroke patterns, challenging skin types, and corrective techniques. This course is designed for PMU artists who want to refine their craft.

curriculum.name: Advanced Stroke Techniques
curriculum.description: Master various stroke patterns for different brow styles and face shapes

curriculum.name: Difficult Skin Types
curriculum.description: Learn to work with oily, mature, and scarred skin successfully

curriculum.name: Color Correction
curriculum.description: Fix old PMU work and correct unwanted pigmentation

curriculum.name: Business & Marketing
curriculum.description: Pricing strategies, client management, and social media marketing

whyChooseUs: Advanced color theory and pigment mixing
